oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Local 903 Paper
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Ford/UAW Local 903 shop paper from Memphis. The national committee voted on a no-strike pledge to continue through World War II. The publication reinforces the importance of sticking with the union. Notes along the right hand of both pages contain personal notes and updates. The publication is unnamed and looking for a title.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: International Union, United Automobile, Aerospace, and Agricultural Implement Workers of America
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); International Union, United Automobile, Aerospace, and Agricultural Implement Workers of America; Committees; Strikes and lockouts; United States. National Labor Relations Act; Labor laws and legislation
